name: H&E Equipment Services, Inc.
description: H&E Equipment Services, Inc. is a leading provider of equipment rental, sales, and service in the construction, industrial, and manufacturing sectors. Founded in 1961 and headquartered in Baton Rouge, Louisiana, H&E offers a comprehensive range of equipment solutions, including aerial lifts, earthmoving equipment, and material handling tools. The company serves a diverse customer base, including contractors, industrial firms, and government entities, with a commitment to delivering high-quality equipment and exceptional customer service. H&E operates a large network of locations across the United States, providing localized support and expertise to its clients. The company also focuses on equipment sales, offering new and used machinery from top manufacturers, along with parts and service support to ensure optimal performance. H&E is dedicated to safety and sustainability, implementing rigorous safety protocols and promoting environmentally friendly practices in its operations. With a strong emphasis on innovation, H&E continues to expand its fleet and service offerings to meet the evolving needs of its customers in a rapidly changing industry.

seo.meta_title: H&E Equipment Services, Inc. | Equipment Rental and Sales
seo.meta_description: Discover H&E Equipment Services, Inc., a leader in equipment rental and sales for construction and industrial sectors. Explore H&E's innovative solutions and commitment to safety.

faq.question: What services does H&E Equipment offer?
faq.answer: H&E Equipment offers equipment rental, sales of new and used equipment, and parts and service support.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of H&E Equipment Services?
faq.answer: John D. Engquist is the CEO of H&E Equipment Services, Inc.

faq.question: Where is H&E Equipment headquartered?
faq.answer: H&E Equipment is headquartered in Baton Rouge, Louisiana, USA.

faq.question: What types of equipment does H&E Equipment rent?
faq.answer: H&E Equipment rents aerial lifts, earthmoving equipment, and material handling equipment.
